bug.author: AndrewLeach
bug.summary: UI Metadata failing to write for public components
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: When running dataproc create cluster op (and other GCP specific ops) compiled from tag 0.5.1 or master, UI metadata is failing to write, and arti.facts are not rendered <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7063614/82941013-84a4a380-9f4a-11ea-865c-769307f90c4e.png></denchmark-link>
What did you expect to happen: When compiling from tag 0.1.38, the UI metadata writes successfully, and artifacts are rendered. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7063614/82941106-a736bc80-9f4a-11ea-922d-12a0b5b3edeb.png></denchmark-link>
Anything else you would like to add: Based on observation of create dataproc cluster op Version 0.1.38 runs and displays UI metadata. Version 0.1.39 fails to run Version 0.1.40 runs but fails to display UI metadata Environment:
Kubeflow CLI Deployment on GCP with kfctl_gcp_iap.v1.0.2.yaml Kubeflow Build commit: 743746b GKE version v1.14.10-gke.37
